entry.title: Monday: Light snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Light snow. Wind east 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southeast 20 this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Light snow. Temperature falling to minus 20 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the morning then clearing. Wind west 30 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 20 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 31 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Monday 27 March 2023
